name: DevScience
body:
# Welcome to DevScience

## Registration

To register, please email the instructor (information below) indicating interest, with the following in the email:

1. Student name, student email, student phone number, student grade level

2. Parent name, parent email, parent phone number

3. Section (A, B, or C)

Note that each section is capped at a maximum of 5 students. Please register ASAP if you want to guarantee a spot!

## Our Mission

DevScience is a nonprofit organization that teaches computer science classes to students from 5th to 8th grade. All profits that we earn are donated back to the Fremont Unified School District, for the benefit of your students. Led by students, for students. 

## Our Founders

Kevin Wu

I love teaching, and finding new applications for software and technology. I'm fluent in HTML, Java, and Bash, and have organized and tutored in several STEM programs. 

Brian Tseng

I'm experienced in both Java and Python, and have used C/C++ in the past. I've tutored in STEM for several years.

Andrew Kan

I enjoy coding, and am fluent in Java and C++. I taught Java last year.

Kanav Kalucha

I am fluent in Java and C++ and love exploring the various applications of computer science. I've taught Java before and look forward to working with you.

## Our Course

**Fundamentals of Computing**

Our curriculum is adapted from Stanford University's famous CS101 course, introduction to computing principles. Through the course, students will learn the basics of programming (variables, loops, if logic, etc.) through JavaScript as well as fundamental concepts in hardware and computer networking. By the end of the session, students will be prepared to tackle any programming language, as well as explore more advanced concepts in computing.

## Scheduling and Tuition

Each section is 8 classes. Note that instructors may alter a class date/time within certain weeks if personal conflicts arise.

**Section A:** August 2nd to August 25th

Tuesday, Thursday at 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM

Instructor: Kanav Kalucha

Email: seankeller@gmail.com

**Section B:** August 3rd to August 26th

Wednesday, Friday at 4:00 PM - 6:00 PM

Instructor: Andrew Kan

Email: 

**Section C:** July 30th to August 21st

Saturday morning, Sunday morning at 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM 

Instructor: Brian Tseng

Email:

Every section (8 classes each) will be $320, a nonrefundable tuition payable in check addressed to the Fremont Unified School District. Tuition will be due on the first day of class.

## Contact

For signup, please email you respective instructor. Email cs.devscience@gmail.com for any general questions, comments, or concerns. We look forward to hearing from you!
